metadata.title: CVE-2012-6100 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
report/outline/index.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.7, 2.3.x before 2.3.4,and 2.4.x before 2.4.1 does not properly enforce themoodle/user:viewhiddendetails capability requirement, which allows remoteauthenticated users to discover a hidden lastaccess value by reading anactivity report.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
